info.title: Navitia API - SNCF
info.description: Complete API documentation for Navitia/SNCF public transportation API. Based on https://doc.navitia.io

datetime.name: datetime
datetime.description: Date and time in format YYYYMMDDTHHmmss

embedded_type.description: Embedded type - determines which embedded object is populated

poi.description: Point of interest object (when embedded_type is 'poi')

level.description: Administrative level (e.g., 8 for city, 7 for department)

administrative_regions.description: List of administrative regions this place belongs to

vehicle_journey.description: Vehicle journey (can be ID string or object)

stop_date_times.description: List of stop times for this section

duration.description: Total duration in seconds (deprecated, use durations.total)

sections.description: List of sections in the journey

is_detour.description: Whether this stop is part of a detour

regions.description: List of coverage region IDs that contain these coordinates

get.summary: Inverted geocoding - get address and coverage regions from coordinates
get.description: Given coordinates, returns the detailed postal address and the Navitia coverage regions that contain these coordinates. The coordinate format is 'lon;lat' (longitude;latitude).

get.summary: Get next departures from a stop area

404.description: Stop area not found or no departures

get.summary: Get next arrivals to a stop area

404.description: Stop area not found or no arrivals

get.summary: Plan a journey between two points

parameters.name: datetime_represents
parameters.description: Whether datetime represents departure or arrival

parameters.name: min_nb_journeys
parameters.description: Minimum number of journeys to return

404.description: Origin or destination not found, or no solution

get.description: Search for places including stop areas, stop points, addresses, POIs, and administrative regions
Find places (stop areas, stop points, addresses, POIs) within a certain distance from coordinates

404.description: Stop not found or no schedules
Route not found or no schedules
Line or stop area not found, or no schedules

get.summary: Inverted geocoding - get address from coordinates
Get stop schedules for a specific stop point
Get route schedules for a specific route
Get line reports for a specific line
Get terminus schedules for a specific line and stop area

get.description: Get a list of vehicle journeys. Can be filtered by headsign, since/until dates, and data_freshness.
Get a list of disruptions. Can be filtered by since/until dates.
Get points of interest within a certain distance from coordinates

parameters.name: poi_types
parameters.description: Filter by POI type IDs (e.g., poi_type:amenity:bicycle_rental)
